questions.question: What type of lesson is 'Golden Chain'?
questions.answer: Story

questions.question: What is the central idea of 'Golden Chain'?
questions.answer: Good deeds connect people

questions.question: What does the 'Golden Chain' symbolize?
questions.answer: Kind actions

questions.question: How is the chain formed in the story?
questions.answer: By helping others

questions.question: What quality is highlighted most?
questions.answer: Kindness

questions.question: The lesson teaches us that good deeds:
questions.answer: Create lasting bonds

questions.question: What happens when people help one another?
questions.answer: Strong relationships

questions.question: The tone of the lesson is:
questions.answer: Moral and inspiring

questions.question: Who benefits from good deeds?
questions.answer: Both

questions.question: The story encourages us to:
questions.answer: Help others

questions.question: What is meant by the 'Golden Chain'?
questions.answer: It refers to the chain of good deeds formed by kindness and help.

questions.question: How is the golden chain created?
questions.answer: By helping one another selflessly.

questions.question: What moral does the lesson teach?
questions.answer: Good deeds bring people together and create happiness.

questions.question: Why are good deeds important?
questions.answer: They strengthen relationships and make society better.

questions.question: What message does the story give to students?
questions.answer: Always help others and do good deeds.
